org.revapi

Interface ElementMatcher

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Configurable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseElementMatcher

    public interface ElementMatcher
extends Configurable, AutoCloseable
    An element matcher is a helper extension to other extensions that need to figure out if a certain element meets certain criteria.
    Author:
    Lukas Krejci

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ElementMatcher.CompiledRecipe
      A "compiled" representation of a textual recipe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<ElementMatcher.CompiledRecipe> compile(String recipe)
      Tries to compile the provided recipe into a form that can test individual elements.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.revapi.configuration.Configurable

        getExtensionId, getJSONSchema, initialize

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • compile

        Optional<ElementMatcher.CompiledRecipe> compile(String recipe)
        Tries to compile the provided recipe into a form that can test individual elements.
        Parameters:
        recipe - the recipe to compile
        Returns:
        a compiled recipe or empty optional if the string cannot be compiled by this matcher
